Note: Much faded and difficult to read.
_description: Fragment of a riddling story regarding the question of relative strengths of wine and women — 13 lines in rough couplets

BosPLMed94.First Lines:
The kengis qwostrown wot thysof thangis qwhyllc þat strangast
                    isThe wyn the woman or þu brengeAnd þat thay sowld apon this
                    theng…
BosPLMed94.Last Lines:
…That þu by dyuers oponyownof argomentis qwht
                    þan…
